techProducts.name: Galaxy S22
techProducts.description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 is a flagship smartphone with a stunning 6.5-inch display, powerful Exynos 2200 processor, and 128GB of storage.

techProducts.name: MacBook Pro 2023
techProducts.description: Experience ultimate productivity with the MacBook Pro 2023. Featuring a 14-inch Retina display, Apple M2 Pro chip, and 512GB SSD storage.

techProducts.name: Sony Bravia A90J
techProducts.description: Immerse yourself in cinematic visuals with the Sony Bravia A90J. This 65-inch 4K OLED TV delivers stunning picture quality and smart features.

techProducts.name: PlayStation 5
techProducts.description: Unleash the power of gaming with the PlayStation 5. Featuring a lightning-fast SSD, breathtaking graphics, and a library of incredible games.

techProducts.name: Fitbit Charge 5
techProducts.description: Track your fitness journey with the Fitbit Charge 5. Monitor your heart rate, analyze your sleep patterns, and stay connected on the go.

techProducts.name: DJI Air 2S
techProducts.description: Capture stunning aerial shots with the DJI Air 2S drone. Equipped with a 20MP camera and advanced obstacle avoidance for safe and creative flights.

techProducts.name: Google Nest Hub Max
techProducts.description: Transform your home with the Google Nest Hub Max. Control your smart home devices, make video calls, and get visual assistance with Google Assistant.

techProducts.name: AirPods Pro
techProducts.description: Immerse yourself in superior sound quality with AirPods Pro. Enjoy active noise cancellation, seamless connectivity, and a comfortable fit.

techProducts.name: Oculus Quest 2
techProducts.description: Step into the world of virtual reality with the Oculus Quest 2. Experience immersive gameplay and entertainment with high-resolution visuals and motion tracking.

techProducts.name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD
techProducts.description: Carry your data securely with the Samsung T7 Portable SSD. With a capacity of 1TB and blazing-fast USB-C interface, transfer files quickly and efficiently.
